name: Your Full Name
summary: Experienced Product Manager with X+ years of experience driving product strategy and execution for [industry/company type]. Proven track record of launching successful products, managing cross-functional teams, and delivering measurable business results. Passionate about user-centered design and data-driven decision making.

experiences.title: Senior Product Manager
achievements: Led product strategy for [product name], resulting in X% increase in user engagement
Managed cross-functional team of X engineers, designers, and analysts
Launched 3 major features that increased revenue by $X
Conducted user research and A/B tests to optimize product experience
Collaborated with stakeholders to define product roadmap and priorities

experiences.title: Product Manager
achievements: Owned product lifecycle from ideation to launch for mobile application
Increased user retention by X% through feature improvements
Coordinated with engineering team to deliver features on time
Analyzed user feedback and metrics to inform product decisions

experiences.title: Associate Product Manager
achievements: Supported senior PM in managing product backlog and sprint planning
Conducted competitive analysis and market research
Created user stories and acceptance criteria for development team
Assisted in product launches and go-to-market strategies

details: Relevant coursework: Product Management, Data Analytics, Strategy

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
